internal.content:
import HomepageTemplate from 'gatsby-theme-carbon/src/templates/Homepage';
export default HomepageTemplate;

<Row>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Introduction"
    subTitle="Getting started with Digital business automation."
    href="/introduction/overview/"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    color="light"
    >

![](./images/home-introduction.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>


<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Methodology"
    subTitle="Master Event-Driven Architectures methodologies from start to finish."
    href="/methodology/event-storming/"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    color="light"
    >

![](./images/home-methodology.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Technology"
    subTitle="Leverage the technologies behind Event-Driven Architectures."
    href="/technology/"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    color="light"
    >

![](./images/home-technology.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Scenarios & Use Cases"
    subTitle="Walk through real-world use cases of event-driven applications."
    href="/scenarios/overview/"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    color="light"
    >

![](./images/home-usecases.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

MdxNode.rawBody:
import HomepageTemplate from 'gatsby-theme-carbon/src/templates/Homepage';
export default HomepageTemplate;

<Row>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Introduction"
    subTitle="Getting started with Digital business automation."
    href="/introduction/overview/"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    color="light"
    >

![](./images/home-introduction.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>


<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Methodology"
    subTitle="Master Event-Driven Architectures methodologies from start to finish."
    href="/methodology/event-storming/"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    color="light"
    >

![](./images/home-methodology.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>

<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Technology"
    subTitle="Leverage the technologies behind Event-Driven Architectures."
    href="/technology/"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    color="light"
    >

![](./images/home-technology.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>

<Row>
<Column colLg={4} colMd={4} noGutterMdLeft>
<ArticleCard
    color="dark"
    title="Scenarios & Use Cases"
    subTitle="Walk through real-world use cases of event-driven applications."
    href="/scenarios/overview/"
    actionIcon="arrowRight"
    color="light"
    >

![](./images/home-usecases.jpg)

</ArticleCard>
</Column>
</Row>
